summary: This function converts an iterable to a string.
formals: is the iterable to convert to a string.
is a string to prepend onto the result.
is a string to place between each element in the result.
is a string to append onto the result.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val primes = [2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17];%0A%0A    val x = F::str(primes, %22(%22, %22, %22, %22)%22);%0A    val y = F::str(primes, %22[%22, %22, %22, %22]%22);%0A    val z = F::str(primes, %22[%22, %22 | %22, %22]%22);%0A%0A    F::println(x);%0A    F::println();%0A%0A    F::println(y);%0A    F::println();%0A%0A    F::println(z);%0A    F::println();%0A}
